text:
After spliting the configuration into many smaller files, the .spec file was not
updated.  The extra conf files are not correctly packaged in 2.1.6-alpha, and in
trunk.
creator: chip@force-elite.com

text:
Created attachment 15547
a patch to the spec file to get a set of rpms

This is a patch to the httpd.spec file to get a set of rpms for a fedora core 4
platform.  I'll let the gurus refine it to the quality it needs to be.
creator: bmillett@gmail.com
jorton@redhat.com
text:
Something similar to this was already committed to the trunk; thanks for the
patch though.  (r240349)
